gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `InvestmentProperties` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `InvestmentProperties` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `InvestmentPropertiesMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentPropertiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentPropertiesEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentPropertiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentPropertiesEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentPropertiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentPropertiesStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentPropertiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentPropertiesStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesInvestmentPropertiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentPropertiesMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesInvestmentPropertiesMovementHousing_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_InvestmentPropertiesMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
